oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial photograph of North Nashville, circa 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of a portion of North Nashville, in the Buena Vista neighborhood, looking southwest, circa 1968, taken by Metro Photographer, William M. King. Shows wooded residential area, including a baseball game in progress at lower left, probably behind Buena Vista School. Streets identified on the photograph include: Garfield Street, Arthur Avenue, 10th Avenue North, 11th Avenue North, and Cockrill Street. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
Interstate 265 would pass near this location when it was built between 1968 and 1971. In 2000, Interstate 265 ceased to exist, and was redesignated as part of Interstate 65.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buena Vista School (Nashville, Tenn.)
